usefulItems: large bowl, cling film, large frying pan, hob, refrigerator
title: Bulgogi (Pan-fried Marinated Beef)

ingredients.content: 550 - 600 g sirloin steak, thinly sliced (1 cm) against the grain (see tip)
100 g carrots, thinly sliced (5 mm) or julienned
40 g spring onions, cut in 3 cm pieces then halved lengthways
2 spring onions, thinly sliced (5 mm), for garnishing

preparations.content: Place a large bowl on mixing bowl lid, weigh in steak, carrots, onions and spring onions then set aside.
Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then chop again <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add kiwi and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add sugar, soy sauce, oil and pepper then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer to bowl with beef and, using hands, massage marinade into beef. Cover with cling film and place in fridge to marinate for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, cook rice.
Place water and salt in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket and weigh in rice. Rinse <b>5 sec/speed 7<b> then steam <b>18-20 min/100°C/speed 4<b> until cooked. Transfer to a bowl and keep warm.
Heat a large frying pan or wok over a medium-high heat. Fry reserved marinated beef and vegetables in batches for 2-3 minutes until cooked. Transfer to a plate and repeat until all beef is cooked.
Garnish beef with sesame seeds and spring onions then serve with reserved steamed rice and kimchi.

hintsAndTricks: To slice steak, find the direction of the grain (the lines of muscle fibre) and slice across the grain rather than parallel to it.
